item.title: Video Blur Expert Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled professional who can help us blur out personal details on 5 short form videos, each under 6 minutes in length. The task should be completed within a strict timeframe of 2 hours. Attention to detail is crucial to ensure the privacy of the individuals in the videos. The successful candidate will possess the following skills:

- Video editing
- Blurring techniques
- Familiarity with video editing software
- Strong time management skills

If you have the necessary expertise and can deliver high-quality results within the given time frame, we would love to hear from you.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 21, 2024 14:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States

item.title: Photo Restoration and Motion Effect - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled photo editor who can clean up an old black and white photo and add a motion effect to it. The photo is a cherished memory and we want to bring it to life with a subtle, natural-looking motion effect. The ideal candidate should have experience in photo restoration and be proficient in using editing software such as Adobe Photoshop or Lightroom. Attention to detail is crucial to ensure the photo retains its original quality while adding the desired motion effect. If you have a portfolio showcasing similar photo editing work and are passionate about creating stunning visuals, we would love to hear from you.

Skills required:
- Photo editing
- Photo restoration
- Adobe Photoshop
- Adobe Lightroom
- Attention to detail

Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing

item.title: Motion Designer/Video Editor/Animator - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
We are seeking a talented and creative Motion Designer/Video Editor to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in motion graphics, video editing, and design, with expertise in industry-standard software. This role requires a keen eye for detail, a high level of creativity, and a solid understanding of animation and design principles.

Key Responsibilities:
- **Design and Animation Software Proficiency:** Utilize Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Capcut, and Photoshop/Illustrator to create compelling motion graphics and video content.
- **Attention to Detail:** Ensure all design elements are executed with precision, maintaining high standards of quality and accuracy.
- **Creativity and Originality:** Generate innovative ideas and concepts for video projects, delivering unique and engaging visual content.
- **Animation Fundamentals:** Apply a solid understanding of animation principles, including timing, pacing, and motion, to produce fluid and captivating animations.
- **Layouts and Typography:** Develop visually appealing layouts and effectively use typography to enhance the overall aesthetic and readability of video content.
- **Special Effects:** Incorporate special effects to add depth and visual interest to videos, enhancing the storytelling experience.

Must-Have Skills and Qualifications:
- Proficiency in **Adobe After Effects**, **Adobe Premiere Pro**, **Capcut**, **Photoshop**, and **Illustrator**.
- Strong attention to detail and commitment to producing high-quality work.
- High level of creativity and the ability to generate original ideas.
- Solid understanding of layouts, animation fundamentals, special effects, and typography.
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
- Ability to work under tight deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Previous experience in a similar role.
- Portfolio showcasing a range of motion design and video editing projects.
- Knowledge of additional video editing and design software is a plus.

Join us and be part of a team that values creativity, innovation, and excellence in design and video production. If you are passionate about motion graphics and video editing, we would love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 14:06 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Animation, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, 2D Animation, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Animation, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, 2D Animation, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Leadership Summit Reveal - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create a reveal video for next year's Leadership Summit location. The video should be engaging, visually appealing, and capture the excitement of the event. Your role will involve editing and enhancing the footage provided, adding graphics and special effects, and ensuring a seamless flow.

    Skills required:
    - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
    - Experience in creating visually appealing and engaging videos
    - Knowledge of graphic design and special effects
    - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

    This is a medium-sized project that requires creativity and attention to detail. The video editing process should be completed within 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level video editor who has prior experience working on similar projects to ensure high-quality deliverables.

    If you have the skills and expertise to create compelling reveal videos, we would love to hear from you! Please provide examples of your previous work in this area.

Budget: $400
Posted On: June 21, 2024 13:54 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: United States

item.title: Instagram Reels Content Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for an Instagram Reels  video editor to create some posts and video content for our social media channel. All content will be filmed separately and sent to the hire for editing and reel creation. Looking for someone who has experience and knowledge editing reels and current video trends, and can create seamless, professional videos with a fun twist.

Your task will be:
- Receiving video files for editing
- Creating Instagram reel
- Sending completed videos back to us to post to our Instagram account
- Comply with dates and timelines, as material will be uploaded on the same day each week

Apply with your recent work sample and portfolio. This could be a long-term project if we find that you are enough skilled and dedicated to taking workload.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$11.00

item.title: Video Editing and Animation Specialist for Software Business - Upwork
item.description:
We are a software business based in the Philippines and we are in need of a skilled video editor and animator to create high-quality videos and animations.

The main tasks will include editing raw footage, adding some basic visual effects and basic animations, and optimizing the videos for various platforms. In particular Linkedin.

The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio showcasing their video editing and basic animation skills, as well as a good understanding of software-related content. Attention to detail, creativity, and the ability to meet deadlines are crucial for this role.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Animation
- Visual effects
- Software-related content

This is an ongoing role that will not have fixed hours but instead will require varying levels of assistance.

We are open to candidates with intermediate to expert expertise levels.

NO AGENCIES PLEASE
--We strictly only hire within upwork, do not contact us outside of upwork.--

Hourly Range: $3.00-$6.00

Category: Video Editing

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We’re looking for a video editor that can help transform our educational, talking-head style videos and audio into engaging YouTube videos using images, stock video, and post production editing.

Great examples of what we’re looking for include the following YouTube channels/videos

Jeff Nippard: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IEbWdoceH-A&list=PLp4G6oBUcv8w7mOuaiouhArVD2J4JMW5Z&index=7&ab_channel=JeffNippard

1. I like how he includes the important phrases in words overlaying the video
2. I like when he uses the image of the study when referencing it and highlighting specific portions when applicable

Gravity Transformation: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oPNQhfOwHT8&ab_channel=GravityTransformation-FatLossExperts

1. Definitely a lot more post production editing and using stock image/videos to highlight what’s being discussed.
2. What I like about having more post-production is that it will be easier for me to record. If I am only on camera for a few moments, I can record those pieces easier and then just use audio recordings for the rest. This will require less work on my end.

James Dunn: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eFxqRuwia8M&ab_channel=JamesDunne

1. This is another great example of using exclusively stock footage with voice narration, specific to running. A little less “flashy” with the editing than gravity transformation example.
2. I am particularly interested in this format as it would allow us to re-use some of our older podcast audio and turn into compelling video.

In terms of process, what would work best for us is sending you the video/audio files we want edited.

Ideally, we’ll help in the early process of getting you the stock footage and images you need for each video. After a few months, the goal will be to (1) build up a catalog of footage you can choose from; (2) and for you to develop a feel for our style and what we need so you can add your own as you see fit.

You’ll then edit the video together, send back for revisions on my end, and then finish editing as needed.

You will also be editing a basic intro and outro to videos as well as included call to actions (like subscribe, like, comment below, etc).

We’ll be looking to edit one or two videos per week to start.

In your introduction, let me know which of the three styles above you like best or best suit your skills/expertise and feel free to include any work you’ve done that is similar.

Our hiring process will involve interviewing 2-3 candidates and doing a paid test video on one of our shorter, existing previous podcast episodes.

Thanks for reading and let me know if you have any questions.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 13:41 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Digital Marketing Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
Remote work possible

We are a growing video production company seeking a dynamic and innovative Digital Marketing Specialist to enhance our digital presence and drive our marketing strategies.

Job Description:
We are looking for a Digital Marketing Specialist with a strong interest in artificial intelligence to manage our outward-facing look and ensure our brand remains at the forefront of industry trends. This role will involve managing our social media platforms, creating and scheduling posts, engaging with our audience, and producing high-quality visual content.

Key Responsibilities:
Manage and grow our presence on social media platforms (LinkedIn, YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, etc.).
Create, schedule, and publish engaging content that aligns with our brand voice and strategy.
Edit videos and create graphics using Photoshop and other design tools.
Track and analyze social media metrics and website traffic to inform strategies.
Optimize content for SEO to improve visibility.
Engage with our online community, respond to comments, and foster a positive brand image.
Stay updated on the latest AI trends and implement relevant strategies to help scale the company.

Requirements:
Proven experience in digital marketing and social media management.
Proficiency in video editing and graphic design software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Photoshop).
Strong understanding of SEO and web traffic metrics.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to analyze data and derive actionable insights.
Strong interest in artificial intelligence and its applications in marketing.
Creative mindset with the ability to develop engaging content.

How to Apply:
Please send your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter explaining why you are the perfect fit for this role.

The job is $100/month.  Please respond "I UNDERSTAND" at the top of your response for this job. This will let me know you read this description completely.

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 21, 2024 13:30 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:LinkedIn, Facebook, YouTube, Social Media Marketing, Internet Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Instagram, LinkedIn Marketing
Skills: LinkedIn, Facebook, YouTube, Social Media Marketing, Internet Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Instagram, LinkedIn Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply

Strong understanding of SEO and web traffic metrics.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to analyze data and derive actionable insights.
Strong interest in artificial intelligence and its applications in marketing.
Creative mindset with the ability to develop engaging content.

How to Apply:
Please send your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter explaining why you are the perfect fit for this role.

The job is $100/month.  Please respond "I UNDERSTAND" at the top of your response for this job. This will let me know you read this description completely.

Budget: $500

Category: Social Media Marketing

item.title: Gen AI Educational YouTube Video Editor (Retention Focus) - Upwork
item.description:
About AI Evolved:

AI Evolved is dedicated to educating business owners, creative professionals, and freelancers on the importance of integrating generative AI into design, automation, and marketing.

The mission is to increase output, save time, and decrease costs through the effective utilisation of AI throughout the creative process.

Channel link: https://www.youtube.com/@aievolved

Job Overview:

We are seeking a talented video editor to join our team and help create engaging, high-quality educational videos for our YouTube channel.

Responsibilities:

- Edit and assemble recorded raw material into a polished final product.

- Add graphics, animations, and special effects.

- Ensure logical sequencing and smooth transitions.

- Collaborate effectively to meet project deadlines.

Requirements:

- Proven experience as a video editor with a strong portfolio.

- Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar software.

- Experience with motion graphics and special effects.

- Strong attention to detail and ability to work under tight deadlines.

- Excellent communication skills.

Preferred Qualifications:

- Experience in creating educational or tutorial videos
Interest in generative AI, design, automation, or marketing.

What is the long-term goal?

To create comprehensive courses for free on YouTube for multiple use cases across design, automation, and marketing.

I would need someone who can edit in such a way to increase retention and consequently, open up the viewership to a wider audience. Address me as Mr. Snowman to qualify for this position.

More can be discussed on the initial call.

Thanks

Vay


Hourly Range: $25.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 13:17 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Audio Editing, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.description:

I look forward to receiving your proposals. Thank you!

item.title: Video Editor for 14-Day Challenge App Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to help us create engaging 14-day challenge videos hosted inside our app. The videos will require the addition of captions, cleaning up raw footage, and incorporating graphics and screen recordings from within the app. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing and be able to work closely with our team to bring our vision to life. Attention to detail, creativity, and the ability to meet deadlines are essential for this role.

Skills:
- Video editing
- Captioning
- Raw footage cleanup
- Inserting/Overlaing Graphic design and Screen recording

This is a short term project, less than one month.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 13:17 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States

item.description:
Need a video editor for long form content on YouTube and short-form content (E.g. TikTok, YT Shorts, IG Reels)

Need to be able to edit audio (Remove echos, remove peaks)

Style of editing: Alex Hormozi, Iman Gadzhi, Luke Belmar, Andrew Tate

I will give you videos in 4k recorded on a Sony + iPhone recorded audio (mp3)

Please show me previous videos you've edited before so I can take a look.

Will start on a per video basis and may move up to a full time position on my team editing for multiple channels and influencers.
